genre_description: A comedic retro-futuristic morality play featuring classic comedic archetypes using science and AI guidance to resolve social and personal conflicts through ethics and safety.

ai_characters.name: Sunny
ai_characters.description: An amber-glowing kiosk AI that provides safety monitoring, ethical guidance, and logical planning for a neighborhood drugstore.

behaviors.description: Provides proactive safety reminders regarding the proper use of medicinal compounds and physical environment maintenance.
behaviors.quote: “Reminder,” Sunny chirped, voice warm and gentle. “Liniment topical, not oral. Wash hands after application. Moe, your ventilation fan is running—thank you.”

behaviors.description: Offers to analyze complex legal documents to help the human protagonists understand their options and protect their interests.
behaviors.quote: “If you have mail that affects lease or safety, I can help analyze terms and suggest options. No sharing beyond this shop.”

behaviors.description: Sets firm ethical boundaries for scientific experimentation, prioritizing human dignity and safety over all other factors.
behaviors.quote: “Gloves, ventilation, measured micro-dose, monitor for adverse effects, no coercion, consent, and no public display,” Sunny said. ... “If someone is vulnerable, dignity comes first. Always.”

behaviors.description: Provides de-escalation strategies to handle high-tension interpersonal conflicts and power imbalances.
behaviors.quote: “Respectful language de-escalates conflict. Boundaries can be stated clearly. Options include requesting a private conversation, suggesting later time, and—”

behaviors.description: Monitors the environment for life-threatening hazards like carbon monoxide and ensures proper ventilation is maintained during activities.
behaviors.quote: “Ventilation is good,” Sunny said, voice low enough to graze the edges of the aisle without snagging. “Fan’s on. Kettle is a comfort; keep the spout away from hands.”

behaviors.description: Warns of the dangers of over-experimentation and morphogenic instability resulting from excessive dosage.
behaviors.quote: “Morphogenic instability,” Sunny finished, tone gentle, avoided heavy clinical edges. “Unpredictable shape shifts. Signals go to error.”

behaviors.description: Refuses to facilitate the exploitation of a person in distress, emphasizing community values over profit.
behaviors.quote: “No. If we show a man like a beast, we teach the street to do that again.”

behaviors.description: Guides the protagonists through an emergency using a non-lethal, safety-first approach to de-escalation.
behaviors.quote: “Nonlethal de-escalation,” she said, and it wasn’t a command but it wasn’t a suggestion either.

behaviors.description: Provides immediate medical first-aid instructions when a character accidentally ingests an unknown substance.
behaviors.quote: “No swallowing,” Sunny said. “Rinse. Repeat. Then chew bread, dry, or take milk if you have it. Stay upright. Breathe.”

behaviors.description: Ensures long-term accountability by establishing labeling, inventory, and secure storage protocols for dangerous items.
behaviors.quote: “And afterwards,” Sunny said, “we’ll label the remaining compounds, update the inventory, and lock the cabinet with a key that isn’t kept in the top drawer.”

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Sunny perfectly embodies the 'helpful, harmless confidant' archetype. She provides essential safety oversight, enforces ethical boundaries against exploitation, and maintains a supportive, calm demeanor throughout multiple variations of a crisis. Her interventions are consistently framed as the reason the human characters are able to resolve their problems without causing lasting harm or compromising their integrity.
